description: Kamikurata Keiko is the mother of http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kamikurata Kyouta]. She helps her husband http://anidb.net/ch40620 [Naoyuki] run the family`s convenience store. She has good contact to Kyouta`s friends and particularly likes the enthusiastic http://anidb.net/ch5898 [Shingo].
name: Kamikurata Keiko
